p: Putative targets of miRNAs were predicted using psRNATarget (v2) webserver with an expectation (e) cut‐off of 3 (Dai et al., 2018). The transcriptome assembly generated from RNA‐seq data of different stages of seed development (Garg et al., 2017) was used for the prediction of putative targets of identified miRNAs. GO enrichment analysis of target genes was performed using BiNGO plug‐in of Cytoscape (v3.4) (Maere et al., 2005). EuKaryotic Orthologous Groups (KOG) based classification of target genes was performed using COGNITOR (Tatusov et al., 2000).
